sentences.en: He sidetracked to enliven the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 他换了个话题来活跃一下气氛.

sentences.en: How can we enliven our party?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样才能使聚会更热闹?

sentences.en: How can we enliven this party?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样使这聚会热闹些 呢 ?

sentences.en: Humour can help enliven a dull subject.
sentences.cn: 幽默有助于使枯燥的话题变得比较有趣。

sentences.en: I love the way a good flirtation can enliven the most mundane situation.
sentences.cn: 恰到好处的打情骂俏能够使最平淡无奇的时刻变得生动有趣起来，我很喜欢这种感觉。

sentences.en: In addition, some Idle enliven tourism resources, and tourist attractions is also a very good thing.
sentences.cn: 另外, 将一些闲置的旅游资源盘活, 对旅游景点来说也是一件大好事.

sentences.en: In the secondary market, this quantity can enliven, has temporarily.
sentences.cn: 二级市场上, 该股量能活跃, 暂持有.

sentences.en: O Bearer of God, the Giver of Life, enliven me who am deadened by passions.
sentences.cn: 施生命之上帝的孕育者,求你使因偏情而垂死的我重获生气.

sentences.en: Quite the contrary - the events you participate in this month will enliven all else that you do.
sentences.cn: 恰恰相反,这个月你所参与的这些事情会使你所做的其他事情也变得生气勃勃.

sentences.en: Soon he was alone, despite his efforts and the lies he told to enliven his story.
sentences.cn: 不久,他就成了孤家寡人, 尽管他付诸努力,甚至用说谎来活跃他的故事也无济于事.

sentences.en: The colored parts and the elaborately arranged letters combine to enliven the space.
sentences.cn: 局部地方的彩色的使用和精心排列的文字内容让整个空间活起来.

sentences.en: The disaster of your family as well as the country enliven your poems.
sentences.cn: 家国的祸难,鲜活了笔下的灵性.

sentences.en: They require little effort, yet these few syllables can enliven someone else's day.
sentences.cn: 这些话不费吹灰之力就可学到, 可是这几个简简单单的音节却能让别人一天都觉得很开心.

sentences.en: To enliven our economy, we should support the legal individual trade.
sentences.cn: 要搞活经济就要扶持正当的个体贸易.

sentences.en: To impart interest or zest to; enliven.
sentences.cn: 给予兴趣,给予热情; 使有活力.

sentences.en: With when spurt, initiate new phase, enliven again.
sentences.cn: 与时迸, 开创新局面, 再抖擞.

trans.tran_cn: 使活泼，使生动，使有生气
